            <string language="en">Toilet-sponge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Toilette-Schwamm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Toilette-éponge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Toalete-esponja</string>

            <string language="x-mt-el">Τουαλέτα-σφουγγάρι</string>

          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Mosdószivacs vázáról készült fotó</string>
            <string language="en">Picture about vase of toilet-sponge</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">szivacsok,  tengerek,  álszövetes,  szimmetria nélküliek,  </string>
            <string language="en">sponges, sea, fake tissue, without symmetry</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abbildung über Vase des 
Toilette-Schwammes</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Image au sujet de vase de toilette-éponge</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retrato sobre o vaso da toalete-esponja</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagine circa il vase della toletta-spugna</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνα για vase του τουαλέτα-σφουγγαριού</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadro sobre el florero de la tocador-esponja</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schwämme, Meer, gefälschtes Gewebe, ohne Symmetrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éponges, mer, tissu faux, sans symétrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esponjas, mar, tecido falsificado, sem simetria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">spugne, mare, tessuto falso, senza simmetria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σφουγγάρια, θάλασσα, πλαστός ιστός, χωρίς συμμετρία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">esponjas, mar, tejido fino falso, sin simetría</string>
          </keyword>
